data.title: Kelly Clarkson's ex-husband, Brandon Blackstock Biography: Age, Net Worth, Parents, Spouse, Instagra
data.meta_description: Brandon Blackstock is an American businessman, pilot, and former talent manager. He is also known as the ex-husband of famous singer Kelly Clarkson. The two married for nearly seven years before officially divorced in 2020. They have two children together.
data.text:
Brandon Blackstock is an American businessman, pilot, and former talent manager.

He is also known as the ex-husband of famous singer Kelly Clarkson. The two married for nearly seven years before officially divorced in 2020. They have two children together.

Profile

Full Name: Brandon Blackstock

Born: December 16, 1976

Age: 47 years old

Birthplace: Texas, United States

Nationality: United States

Occupation: businessman, pilot, and former talent manager.

Height: 5â8

Parents: Narvel Blackstock, Elisa Gayle Ritter.

Siblings: Shelby Blackstock, Chassidy Celeste Blackstock, Shawna Rene Blackstock.

Spouse: Melissa Ashworth, Kelly Clarkson

Children: 4

Relationship: single

Net Worth: $10 million

Early Life And Education

Brandon Blackstock was born on December 16, 1976, in Fort Worth, Texas, United States.

He was raised by his parents, Narvel Blackstock and Elisa Gayle Ritter. He had three siblings: Shelby Blackstock, Chassidy Celeste Blackstock, and Shawna Rene Blackstock.

He finished his studies and graduated with a business degree.

Career

In Blackstockâs professional life, Blackstock started as a talent manager for a famous country singer, Blake Shelton, who also judges the singing show âThe Voice.â

He also worked for Rascal Flatts in 2006 as his tour manager when he met Kelly Clarkson. However, despite his success in the music industry, Blackstock has faced personal and legal challenges, including a recent divorce from his wife, singer Kelly Clarkson.

In addition to his work in the entertainment industry, he has also pursued a passion for aviation and is a licensed pilot.

He comes from a family with strong ties to the world of television and music, as his father is a television producer, and his stepmother is a renowned country music artist.

Despite his previous marriage to fellow entertainer Kelly Clarkson, he has continued to work on projects with her and her family, showcasing a solid and supportive relationship.

Social Media

Brandon Blackstock does not have a social media account.

Personal Life

Blackstock, 47, personal life has been through two marriages. His first marriage was to his beautiful wife, Melissa Ashworth.

Together, they had two children: a daughter named Savannah and a son named Seth. Unfortunately, their relationship did not last, and they divorced after ten years of marriage in 2012.

After that, Blackstock married his second wife, Kelly Clarkson, in October 2013. She is a popular singer widely famous as the winner of American Idol 2002 and the coach of âThe Voice.â

Ultimately, they married on October 20, 2013, at Blackberry Farm in Walland, Tennessee. However, after over seven years of marriage and four children together, including two from Brandonâs previous relationship, their marriage ended in June 2020 when Kelly filed for divorce.

This marked the end of their happy union and the beginning of a new chapter for both individuals.

Net Worth

Blackstock is not just known as Clarksonâs ex-husband, but he also has a successful career as a talent manager.

With a net worth of $10 million, he has proven his skills in the competitive entertainment industry. Being a talent manager requires strong negotiation skills, business acumen, and a keen eye for spotting potential.

Blackstockâs success in this field speaks to his dedication and hard work rather than just being known as a celebrityâs former spouse.
